trace.comment: Here you can define a name for this set of parameters
trace.name: Quian Quiroga artificial dataset

spkD.comment: This section defines parameters regarding the peak detection process

filt.comment: This section defines parameters regarding the filtering process.

spkA.comment: This section defines parameters regarding the interpolation and alignment process.

spkE.comment: This section defines parameters regarding the deletion of some spikes from the process.

wv.comment: This section defines parameters regarding the wavelet decomposition of spikes.

gmm.comment: This section defines parameters regarding the clustering algorithm.

blur.comment: This section defines parameters regarding the blurring process.
